pr_title: Redundant tenant flow initiation removed when setting permission in the scim2/Roles endpoint

timeline.message: Context user maintained for subsequent tenant flow in the scim2/Roles endpoint.

timeline.bodyText: is the new tenant domain different from the previous one? if so we may not need to start the tenant flow here at all
timeline.author: pulasthi7

replies.bodyText: It could be different due to deviations of certain flows. This flow needs to be started for the required tenant to make sure these operations are carried out for the intended tenant.
replies.author: ashendes

replies.bodyText: No deviations of the flow was discovered. Hence the tenant flow initiation was removed in 29de1b6
replies.author: ashendes

timeline.message: Full permission tree check added when setting all permissions by an a non super-admin user.
